model

Interface Grid<S extends State,N extends java.lang.Enum<N>,C extends Cell<?,N>>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GrilleHexagonale, GrilleRectangulaire, SuperGrille

    public interface Grid<S extends State,N extends java.lang.Enum<N>,C extends Cell<?,N>>
    Interface representant le patron d'une grille.
    See Also:
    SuperGrille
